article_title: 'I don't believe in peace now,' released Gaza hostage tells BBC
sentence: But  all  that  changed  when  Hamas  attacked  southern  Israel,  killing  about  1,200  people  and  taking  251  hostages  into  Gaza,  Ms  Sagi  among  them.

article_title: 'I don't believe in peace now,' released Gaza hostage tells BBC
sentence: She  is  aware  of  the  116  hostages  still  left  behind,  41  of  whom  Israel  says  are  presumed  dead,  and  is  urging  the  Israeli  government  to  agree  a  new  Gaza  ceasefire  and  hostage  release  deal  with  Hamas.

article_title: 'I don't believe in peace now,' released Gaza hostage tells BBC
sentence: "Israel  have  to  do  the  deal. . .  bring  back  home  all  these  hostages  who  [are]  alive  and  also  dead,"  she  says.
